newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Stockpile sells vanadium for average $3.38/lb.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Stockpile sells vanadium for average $3.38/lb.

text.p: The U.S. Defense National Stockpile Center said it sold 191,923 pounds (87 tonnes) of vanadium pentoxide for $648,841.57 or an average price of $3.38 per pound.
Shieldalloy Metallurgical Corp of New Jersey bought 63,952 pounds at $3.40 per pound, and Considar Inc of New York bought 64,131 pounds at $3.39 per pound, and 63,840 pounds at $3.35 per pound.
The sale exhausted the amount of vanadium pentoxide available for sale during fiscal 1997 which began October 1, 1996.
